==== Systems ====
Systems I currently have Ubuntu running on, and some details about them:

Dell Inspiron E1505N

Specs:
* Lucid Lenny 10.04 (LTS) 64-bit
* Intel Core 2 Duo processor T5300 (1.73GHz/2MB Cache/533MHz FSB)
* 15.4 Inch UltraSharp TrueLife Wide-screen WSXGA+ (1680×1050 resolution)
* 4GB-DDR2-800MHz, Chipset limitations cap usable at 3.2GB (shipped with:512MB, DDR2, 533MHz (2×256MB))
* 256MB NVIDIA GeForce Go 7300 w/TurboCache
* 250GB 5400RPM SATA HD
* 8X DVD+/-RW Drive
* Intel PRO/Wireless 3945 802.11a/g Mini Card (54Mbps)
* 85 WHr 9-cell Lithium Ion Primary Battery (Dead, eBay replacement also failed)
Uses:
* Everyday workstation

MSI 6676-001BUS (Barebones system, http://us.msi.com/index.php?func=proddesc&maincat_no=134&prod_no=1985 )
* Lucid Lenny 10.04 (LTS) 64-bit
* Intel Atom D510 (1.66GHz/Dual-core w/HyperThreading)
* NM10 Chipset
* 2x1GB DDR2 (System max of 2x2GB, but no need at this point - may swap with the E1505N if I need more)
* 80GB? boot volume
* 750GB data volume
* 10/100/1000 NIC
Uses:
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Debmirror|Debmirror]]</nowiki> - to host a local mirror (Lenny i386,amd64 currently)
* Automated backups of home PCs - the other Ubuntu machines, will be adding in my Windows 7 desktop machine.
